section.p: You take from her money pouch. It is little enough compensation for all she’s put you through in the past. Hearing her moan and turn over in her sleep, you give her the empty money pouch to cuddle. What a grand joke, when the swashbuckling burglar wakes to find she’s been robbed!
You quietly let yourself out, pleased to have settled the score after so long. Lose the codeword Anger and .
